title: How old is your current phone? What did you do to the older phone when you bought this phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: My current phone is a matte black Apple iPhone 7 Plus 256GB that I purchased in Jun 2017. At this point of time I’ve no intention of upgrading to a new device for another year, although I might have to change the battery soon. Before I bought this phone I was using a Gold colour Apple iPhone 6 with 16GB storage capacity. I sold that phone on one of the online portals that’s popular for buying and selling used items.

my current phone is a oneplus 6 it is 1.5 years old even after 1.5 years it still runs as smooth as when it was new my phone before this one was a iphone 6 i still have that phone and sometimes i use it when my phone is charging in other ways i use the iphone as a 2nd phone
